website_summaries.verdict: This brake performs beautifully on both mountain and road bikes.
pros: Provides instant upgrade over cantilever options
Works seamlessly on broad range of bikes
More affordable than many comparable options
cons: May break easily, even after limited use
Springs often need  tuning prior to installation

customer_reviews.title: Quality fine, mounted easily, good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems just fine, and it mounted easily. I thought I was missing a part and notified Coont through their storefront. They responded quickly, but the real problem was me; I had the part the whole time but had misplaced it! Sorry Coont for the false alarm; thank you for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product to replace some brakes on a bike my son picked up at a garage sale. The product worked for what we needed but was a bit complicated to get put on like it was needed. We ended up having to order another cable for it to fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option to replace clapped out stock brakes.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive v-brake set, and work as advertised. Sturdy and well built. My bike stops like a dream even with the stock pads on these brakes. I replaced decades old stock v-brakes that would no longer adjust correctly. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Grant L.

customer_reviews.title: Installation easier than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was contemplating on going to the bike shop to get my bike brakes fixed. Didn't know that all I needed was to get it replaced. Brakes wear out over time. They need replacing and not just the pads. I spent so much time trying to fix the broken ones by trying to balance it. But it wouldn't. Just replace it. So easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: these were a nice upgrade and fit well and preform well
customer_reviews.text: rebuilding an old dontated bike. these were a nice upgrade and fit well and preform well, Make sure you have cable housing all the way to them for the best operations
customer_reviews.author: Insert Name

customer_reviews.title: Fit my mtb hard tail.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced shimano brakes that had broke. Work just fine and are cheap to boot. Great deal😁
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great brake for new or old project
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for a kid's Specialized Hotrock brake. Worked perfectly and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny California

customer_reviews.title: Yes Are there better products? Yes Are there better products for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Do they work? Yes Are there better products? Yes Are there better products for this price? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: works great. Terrific Quality
customer_reviews.text: works great . Terrific Quality .......Great price .... Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Benny Rappa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brakes. Used them on two bikes.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the best inexpensive set of V-brakes out there. I bought this set to convert my old bike from canteliver brakes to V-brakes. For a full conversation, I also had to install V-brake handles. I already bought my own brake pads, so I used them instead of the ones that came with this set. The brakes work surprisingly well, and I am completely satisfied with my purchase. In fact, I bought a second pair and installed it on another bike that needed a replacement. I would definitely recommend this set to anyone who needs an inexpensive brakes replacement for their bike.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, you might need a little more on the handle side to make them tight.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pair front/back V brakes for a mountain bikes.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Jones Sr

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with manufacturer's packaging already opened. Did not function at all. Appeared to be returned before.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for street  cruising
customer_reviews.text: Nice complete set. Easy to install. Rode a few miles since install and holding up great. Installed on bike we just ride at parks and roads.
customer_reviews.author: Haas's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect to replace the brakes for my ~2000 Schwinn.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Missing part.
customer_reviews.text: I The brakes were good but I received one of them with out the spring fixture. The packaging was lose so when I received it, it was out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive parts
customer_reviews.text: All parts there and as expected. Lower end parts similar to department store bike it was made to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Fixed a old bike
customer_reviews.text: Fixed a bike for my granddaughter for a cheap price
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Eberlein

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Although the front pair is for the same side, it is good enough to get the bike repaired. Better than to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: mingdong01

customer_reviews.title: Good condition
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, look nice, work well, and they don't seem to fade too quickly. Really, what more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Othman

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you have time to wait.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I just wish it didn't take 6 weeks to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, great deal . Couldn't find a better price.
customer_reviews.author: n/a

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: These worked amazingly well on my older Schwinn mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. A.

customer_reviews.title: One set of the two was broken in the packaging
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried to install both pairs but the pin on one was bent at a 90 degree angle out of the envelope and the spring on the same piece did not return to the start position. The one pair that WAS normal works fine. I wouldn't recommend this particular product given the apparent manufacturing defects of the spring. (Defective one is on the right, we tried to straighten the pin out but it didn't help.)
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for updating my old brakes
customer_reviews.text: These brakes worked great compared to old center pull on my old Giant mountain bike!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mazure

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. Received it on time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the money. The brakes on my Sshwinn Point Beach were junk and couldn't be adjusted properly. Problem solved for 16 bucks. Iteven comes with the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Super Seven

customer_reviews.title: Good price to repair a cheap bike to begin with
customer_reviews.text: Good price to repair a cheap bike to begin with. I felt some of the parts were actually upgrades and better built.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry White

customer_reviews.title: Good value for replacement brakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the cantilever brakes on my winter bike. they work fine for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: kenh

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need except the pivot bolts. Decent quality for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Good value. Everything needed was included. Easy to install .adjustment screws work well. Unfortunately it wont work for my setup because I use shimano sora road bike levers and the pull is too short a I have to switch to a set that has a shorter arm for more leverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pl re send theu broke 1 wk
customer_reviews.text: Product broke while installing second 1 broke e days later please send re placement
customer_reviews.author: george hlibiczuk

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it good to stop.
customer_reviews.text: Great price quality product. Installed these on a mountain bike with the cantilever brakes because it just didn't want to stop especially the front brake. So after installing the Ztto V brakes i took the bike out for a down hill ride and was amazed with the stopping power of these brakes. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S

product_meta.title: Ztto Bike V-Brake Front Rear Pair Set for Two Wheels

Er Way Mountain Bike Folding Bike V Brake Front Rear Pair Set for Two Wheels 

Feedback: 
If there are any problems, please contact us freely, we will make our best to solve any problems for you. 
If you are very satisfied with our product, we hope you can give us a positive feedback and welcome you back next time.

Easy to mount, works well at a reasonable price.
